## Description
Please describe the changes you've made. What problem does this solve?

## Type of Change
- [ ] New problem added
- [ ] New language solution for an existing problem
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring/Optimization

## Language(s)
- [ ] Python
- [ ] Java
- [ ] C++
- [ ] Go
- [ ] JavaScript/TypeScript
- [ ] Other: ___

## Checklist
- [ ] I have followed the [Contribution Guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [ ] My solution file is named `solution.<ext>` (e.g., `solution.py`, `solution.java`).
- [ ] I have included time and space complexity in the comments.
- [ ] I have updated the problem's `README.md` Solutions table.
- [ ] I have updated the category `Readme.md` if adding a new problem.
- [ ] (If applicable) I have included driver/test code for verification.

## Verification
Please describe how you tested your changes.
- [ ] Ran the solution locally with sample inputs.
- [ ] Verified the output matches the expected result.
